==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|einmāle}}, equivalent to {{suffix|de|ein|mal}}. Compare {{cog|gml|ênmâl}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈaɪ̯nmaːl/}} * {{audio|de|De-einmal.ogg|Audio}} ===Adverb=== {{de-adv}} # [[once]], [[one]] time {{gloss|one and only one time}} # once {{gloss|formerly; during some period in the past}} #: {{ux|de|Ich werde das nur '''einmal''' sagen.|I'm only going to say it '''once'''.}} # [[sometime]] {{gloss|at an indefinite but stated time in the past or future}} # [[first of all]], [[for starters]], [[firstly]] {{gloss|as an initial point; before any other considerations}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|einmal ist keinmal}} * {{l|de|es war einmal}} * {{l|de|nicht einmal}} * {{l|de|noch einmal}} * {{l|de|einmalig}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|einfach}}, {{l|de|einköpfig}} * {{l|de|zweimal}}, {{l|de|dreimal}}, {{l|de|viermal}}, {{l|de|fünfmal}}, {{l|de|sechsmal}} * {{l|de|manchmal}} [[Category:German modal particles]] [[Category:German multiplicative numbers]] {{topics|de|One}}
